name: Endtime Convenience Store - Demo
description:
The Endtime Convenience Store Demo is a small narrative game that tells the story of a Convenience Store left in a deserted area after a massive earthquake. The main character, the store manager, tries to make ends meet by running a convenience store in this no-man's land. But what can he sell, what can he earn, and who can he meet in these last days....

《Endtime Convenience Store Demo》(末世便利店Demo)是一款叙事小游戏，它讲述了在一场巨大地震后，残留在一片荒芜中的一家便利店的故事。男主角，店长，在这片无主之地上尝试运营一家便利店以维持生活。但是，在这末世中，他能卖些什么、赚些什么、又能遇到些什么人呢......
